underlying_goal: Delete all postgres-related Terraform infrastructure and CI/CD configuration because Cloud SQL connectivity from VPC-external environments is infeasible
friction_detail: A hook security warning blocked the first deploy.yaml edit attempt, requiring a re-read and retry.
brief_summary: User asked to delete postgres-related Terraform, CI/CD steps, and associated tooling per a detailed plan; Claude successfully removed all files, updated configs, committed, and created PR #53.
